attributes.action:
Everyone stay home for two weeks to
get rid of Coronavirus!
attributes.additional_details:
Every single living soul should stay home
and reduce the spread of Coronavirus. What is the government doing exactly? you want everyone to catch it? We’d be like Italy!! If everyone stays home there would be more time for organising and planning how to
Rid the virus also how to calm the public. This has to be done! Start toHire people so they could deep clean streets, we need to do something now!
attributes.background:
I want the government to give an order to its
People to stay home! Coronavirus should
Be taken seriously, this is our country what is happening? People have to stay home to reduce its spread, and people whom infected could get treated within its time frame at home.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that everyone should stay at home to prevent the spread of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
